package.name: Rp_Customfield_on_CMS_page
package.summary: This is a small extension for Magento that allows you to add the custom field in the core functionality.
package.description:
This is a small extension for Magento that allows you to add the custom field in the core functionality.
Features:
- This small extension will use to add the custom field on admin panel under the CMS > Page. - After installing the extension, it will create the custom field with new fieldset(i.e. new section) under the Page Information tab. - Compatible with 1.9.x.
Installation steps:
- Its very easy to install, just copy app/ folder and paste on your magento root folder. - If you want to display on frontend at any place then you just have to add the following line where you want to display: echo $page = Mage::getModel('cms/page')->load('home','identifier')->getCustom_newtab_value(); - You are done with installation. - After you upload the extension files to your magento installation folder, Refresh the cache from Admin > System > Cache Management. - Logout and login again from Backend to reload.
